```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, continuous outcome}
patientid=c(1:20000)
physicianid=c(1:200)
pp=sample(c(rep(0,100),rep(1,100)))

X1=rnorm(20000, mean=0, sd=1)
X2=runif(20000, min=0, max=1)
X3=rbinom(20000, size=1, prob=0.35)

M=cbind(X1,X2,X3)
cov=cov(M)
```
